title: BrilexDz
description: Brilex is a React-based product showcase platform designed for Garden Clean MESTAR, an Algerian company specializing in industrial detergents and hygiene products. The platform allows users to browse, filter, and explore a wide range of products by categories such as disinfectants, insecticides, and more. With a seamless UI built using Tailwind CSS and powered by the Context API for global state management, Brilex provides an intuitive shopping experience.

title: CodeFlow
description: CodeFlow is a developer-centric platform inspired by StackOverflow, designed to facilitate knowledge sharing, problem-solving, and networking within the developer community. This web application allows developers to ask and answer questions, browse job listings, and create an account to personalize their experience.

title: Project Charik.fr clone
description: This project is a React-based recreation of parts of the Charik website, designed to assess proficiency in React and frontend development. The project demonstrates skills in building responsive and user-friendly web applications using modern frontend technologies.

title: SummarizerBot
description: This React application empowers you to quickly grasp the essence of any web content using the power of GPT-4. Simply provide a URL, and our application leverages the RapidAPI platform to seamlessly integrate GPT-4's capabilities. tech stacks : React-vite , Redux , TailwindCss , rapidApi.

title: PulsePricing
description: About this is a front-end practice challenge to make a responsive design for the pulse website pricing page using html and css only with min mediaqueries . .
